title: Proactiv Solution 3 Step System Kit, 2 Month Supply
description:
Our basic clear skin kit includes full-size bottles of the essential Proactiv Solution system. This system, developed by dermatologists, uses Combination TherapyTM to help heal and stop breakouts at their source.

Includes: 
Renewing Cleanser to wash away excess oil and dirt

Revitalizing Toner to balance skin tone

Repairing Lotion to help attack bacteria

title: Burt's Bees Hand Salve, 3 oz Tin
description: If you have rough, dry hands, Burt’s Bees Hand Salve knows how to handle it. Brimming with botanical oils, herbs and beeswax, this classic hand salve offers your hard-working skin the hydration it craves. With its refreshing herbal scent, it’s perfect for both men and women. This travel size tin of 100% natural moisturizer fits in a pocket or purse for anytime salvation from rough, dry skin. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Burt's Bees Almond Milk Beeswax Hand Crème, 2 Ounces (Pack of 2)
description: Dry hands happen. That’s why super rich Burt’s Bees Almond Milk Beeswax Hand Cream contains sweet almond oil and vitamin E to help your hard-working skin. This jar of 100% natural hand moisturizer also contains beeswax to help seal and condition. Plus it has a pleasant, nutty almond scent. Simply massage a dollop of cream onto skin after every hand washing or anytime your hands crave pampering. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.
